links.title: Apple Winning Streak Continues as $1T Market Cap Approaches
links.description: Apple (AAPL ) continues to trade as if it's a hot IPO, when in actuality the stock is nearing the $1T market cap designation. The stock has been up 9 sessions in a row as performance chasers continue to pound the buy button.

messages.body: $AAPL i bought at 190$ hmm.. Kinda scared now.

@AdamAlpha @LenaDunham No worries. ..Just understand that $aapl Pay is tiny, tiny % of biz.

$AAPL

@happyjoeluckie no I haven't been following $AAPL very long. What else do they make?

structurable.title: Self-Driving Cars
structurable.description: These stocks are either dipping their toes into the autonomous vehicles market or going all-in. They're more than ready for the self-driving future.
structurable.long_description: Self-driving cars can save millions of lives each year. They can also safely drive you home when you're half in the bag. These stocks are betting big on the future of autonomous driving, because it's quickly becoming more of a reality.

top_users.name: If you want to be a winner

links.title: What to do now that we bounced
links.description: Free After-Hours Update: On Thursday the S&P500 extended last week's rebound off 2,600 support and now finds itself well above the 50dma and 2,700 resistance. What a difference a few days...
